health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions on prevalence of HIV/AIDS in youths and young mothers in Nakuru County, comparison of HIV data nationally vs. in Nakuru County, partners supporting HIV programs, HIV testing and positivity rates among teenagers, challenges in eliminating mother to child transmission, and strategies to curb rising HIV/AIDS infections among adolescents and teenage mothers.
health_data_challenges: Erratic commodity supply, inadequate equipment for infant testing, low male involvement, non-adherence to treatment due to stigma, inadequate funds for community PMTCT, and inadequate PMTCT sites.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Offer age-appropriate HIV prevention packages, implement ongoing programs for young mothers, conduct quarterly meetings for adolescents and young persons, operationalize support programs, decentralize PrEP and condoms, mobilize communities for change, engage with vulnerable children programs, and raise awareness on vulnerability.
health_evidence_base: Kenya Health Information System, National Syndemic Disease Control Council
health_evidence_requested: Detailed information on prevalence of HIV/AIDS among youth and young mothers in Nakuru County, measures by the County Department of Health Services to address rising cases of HIV/AIDS in teenagers and young mothers, and challenges in achieving elimination of mother to child transmission.
